name: VR Walking Simulator
description:
VR Walking Simulator lets you explore numerous realistic natural environments from the comfort of your room. The game supports SteamVR fully, so customize it to your liking. Play sitting, standing, or walk around.

If you see something particularly nice, use your handheld polaroid camera to take a picture and use it as your desktop wallpaper. The camera can take pictures with as much resolution as you want!
